3.title: Season 3
3.description: Xiao Yan's journey continues as he faces the challenges of the Jia Ma Empire and seeks to grow stronger to uphold his three-year agreement.
3.vas: Xiao Yan:Rohan Sharma,Yao Lao:Vikram Kumar,Queen Medusa:Anjali Mehta

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.description: In the Tager Desert, Xiao Yan seeks the Heavenly Flame. He discovers it's in the hands of the snake-people tribe, guarded by the formidable Queen Medusa.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.description: Queen Medusa prepares to evolve using the Heavenly Flame's power. Xiao Yan and Yao Lao wait for the perfect moment to strike as she begins the dangerous ritual.

episodes.title: Episode 3
episodes.description: Medusa's evolution fails, reverting her into a small, powerless snake. Yao Lao helps Xiao Yan seize this opportunity to steal the Green Lotus Core Flame.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.description: With Yao Lao's guidance, Xiao Yan begins the excruciatingly painful process of absorbing the Heavenly Flame into his own body.

episodes.title: Episode 5
episodes.description: Xiao Yan successfully tames the Heavenly Flame, causing his strength to soar. He decides to take the small snake, the reverted Queen Medusa, with him.

episodes.title: Episode 6
episodes.description: Returning to the Jia Ma Empire, Xiao Yan learns of the Alchemist Grand Competition and decides to participate under the alias 'Yan Xiao'.

episodes.title: Episode 7
episodes.description: The Alchemist Grand Competition begins. Xiao Yan easily passes the preliminary rounds, shocking everyone with his exceptional talent.

episodes.title: Episode 8
episodes.description: As the competition intensifies, Xiao Yan faces off against formidable young alchemists, showcasing his superior soul control and refining techniques.

episodes.title: Episode 9
episodes.description: In the final round, contestants must refine a tier-5 pill. Xiao Yan faces sabotage from his rivals but remains unfazed.

episodes.title: Episode 10
episodes.description: Xiao Yan stuns the judges by successfully refining the 'Three-Lined Green Spirit Pill', winning the championship title.

episodes.title: Episode 11
episodes.description: As champion, Xiao Yan obtains a crucial medicinal formula for Yao Lao. He prepares to fulfill his three-year agreement with Nalan Yanran.

episodes.title: Episode 12
episodes.description: Xiao Yan arrives at the Misty Cloud Sect to challenge Nalan Yanran, setting the stage for their long-awaited duel.

4.title: Season 4
4.description: After leaving the Jia Ma Empire, Xiao Yan travels to the Black-Corner Region, a land of chaos and opportunity, to attend the Canaan Academy.
4.vas: Xiao Yan:Rohan Sharma,Yao Lao:Vikram Kumar,Xiao Xun'er:Priya Singh

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.description: The day of the Three-Year Agreement has arrived. Xiao Yan ascends the stairs of the Misty Cloud Sect to face his former fianc√©e, Nalan Yanran.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.description: The duel begins. Xiao Yan and Nalan Yanran clash, showcasing the incredible progress they've both made over the past three years.

episodes.title: Episode 3
episodes.description: Nalan Yanran reveals her trump card, a powerful technique of the Misty Cloud Sect. Xiao Yan is pushed onto the back foot.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.description: To counter, Xiao Yan unleashes the Angry Buddha Lotus Flame, a terrifying fusion of Heavenly Flames, shocking everyone present.

episodes.title: Episode 5
episodes.description: Xiao Yan emerges victorious. He formally dissolves the engagement, restoring his and his family's honor. But the matter is far from over.

episodes.title: Episode 6
episodes.description: The Misty Cloud Sect's elder, Yun Leng, refuses to let Xiao Yan leave, accusing him of murdering a sect member. A new, deadlier conflict erupts.

episodes.title: Episode 7
episodes.description: Outnumbered, Xiao Yan is in grave danger. Hai Bodong and other allies intervene, but the power of the entire Misty Cloud Sect is overwhelming.

episodes.title: Episode 8
episodes.description: Just as Xiao Yan is about to be captured, Queen Medusa makes a surprise appearance, creating an opportunity for him to escape.

episodes.title: Episode 9
episodes.description: A wounded Xiao Yan goes into hiding. The Misty Cloud Sect issues a warrant for his arrest, putting the entire Jia Ma Empire on high alert.

episodes.title: Episode 10
episodes.description: The Misty Cloud Sect, seeking revenge, attacks the Xiao Clan. Xiao Yan's family is thrown into chaos and forced to flee.

episodes.title: Episode 11
episodes.description: Emerging from his recovery, Xiao Yan learns of the attack on his family. Consumed by rage, he vows to make the Misty Cloud Sect pay.

episodes.title: Episode 12
episodes.description: Xiao Yan returns to the Misty Cloud Sect, this time not for a duel, but for war. He confronts Yun Leng and the elders who destroyed his home.

episodes.title: Episode 13
episodes.description: The battle intensifies as Xiao Yan, with Yao Lao's power, displays the strength of a Dou Wang, killing Yun Leng in a furious assault.

episodes.title: Episode 14
episodes.description: The former sect leader, Yun Shan, emerges from his seclusion. As a Dou Zong expert, his power is far beyond anything Xiao Yan can handle.

episodes.title: Episode 15
episodes.description: Yun Shan easily defeats Xiao Yan and his allies. It's revealed that Yun Shan is collaborating with the sinister Soul Hall.

episodes.title: Episode 16
episodes.description: The Soul Hall's envoy attempts to capture Yao Lao's spirit. To protect his student, Yao Lao is captured, leaving Xiao Yan devastated.

episodes.title: Episode 17
episodes.description: A mysterious, powerful entity helps Xiao Yan escape the Misty Cloud Sect. He is left broken, without his teacher and his clan scattered.

episodes.title: Episode 18
episodes.description: Xiao Yan finds refuge and begins to process his loss. He realizes he must become stronger on his own to rescue Yao Lao and rebuild his clan.

episodes.title: Episode 19
episodes.description: His next destination is the Canaan Academy in the chaotic Black-Corner Region, a place where he can grow powerful and find another Heavenly Flame.

episodes.title: Episode 20
episodes.description: Xiao Yan arrives in the Black-Corner Region, a lawless land where strength is everything. He gets his first taste of its brutality.

episodes.title: Episode 21
episodes.description: To earn money and information, Xiao Yan uses his alchemy skills, quickly making a name for himself in a local city.

episodes.title: Episode 22
episodes.description: He encounters his brothers, Xiao Li and Xiao Ding, who have also fled to the Black-Corner Region and established a mercenary group.

episodes.title: Episode 23
episodes.description: Xiao Yan helps his brothers deal with a rival faction, showcasing his newfound power and solidifying their foothold in the region.

episodes.title: Episode 24
episodes.description: With his family affairs settled for now, Xiao Yan bids farewell to his brothers and heads towards the Canaan Academy, ready for a new chapter.

5.title: Season 5
5.description: The epic conclusion where Xiao Yan must face his ultimate foes and fulfill his destiny to become the Flame Emperor.
5.vas: Xiao Yan:Rohan Sharma,Yao Lao:Vikram Kumar,Queen Medusa:Anjali Mehta,Xiao Xun'er:Priya Singh

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.description: Xiao Yan arrives at Canaan Academy and is immediately thrown into the intense entrance trial, where new students must survive against senior students.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.description: During the trial, Xiao Yan reunites with Xiao Xun'er and meets new friends. They form a team to combat the senior hunting parties.

episodes.title: Episode 3
episodes.description: The 'Fire Energy Hunting Competition' begins. Xiao Yan's group clashes with the 'White Gang', one of the powerful senior factions.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.description: Xiao Yan demonstrates his leadership and strength, turning the tables on the senior students and leading the new students in a counter-attack.

episodes.title: Episode 5
episodes.description: After the competition, Xiao Yan and his friends establish their own faction, 'Pan's Gate', to protect themselves in the competitive academy environment.

episodes.title: Episode 6
episodes.description: To earn 'Fire Energy' for training, Pan's Gate starts a business selling medicinal pills, putting them in direct competition with other factions.

episodes.title: Episode 7
episodes.description: Xiao Yan learns about the Blazing Sky Qi Refining Tower, a special training ground that can accelerate cultivation, and the Fallen Heart Flame hidden within.

episodes.title: Episode 8
episodes.description: The conflict with the White Gang escalates. Xiao Yan challenges their leader, Bai Cheng, to a duel in the Fighting Arena.

episodes.title: Episode 9
episodes.description: Xiao Yan defeats Bai Cheng, solidifying Pan's Gate's reputation and earning a significant amount of Fire Energy.

episodes.title: Episode 10
episodes.description: He enters the Blazing Sky Qi Refining Tower for the first time, experiencing its incredible cultivation effects and the strange pull of the underground flame.

episodes.title: Episode 11
episodes.description: Pan's Gate faces a new threat from the 'Medicine Gang', who try to monopolize the medicinal pill market. Xiao Yan retaliates with superior alchemy.

episodes.title: Episode 12
episodes.description: Xiao Yan participates in the Inner Academy's Strong Ranking Competition to test his skills and win a chance to train deeper in the tower.

episodes.title: Episode 13
episodes.description: He faces Liu Qing, one of the top experts in the Inner Academy, in a fierce battle that pushes both to their limits.

episodes.title: Episode 14
episodes.description: Xiao Yan's performance in the competition earns him a spot among the top ten, granting him access to the lower levels of the refining tower.

episodes.title: Episode 15
episodes.description: The seal on the Fallen Heart Flame begins to weaken, causing unrest within the academy. The elders prepare for its inevitable eruption.

episodes.title: Episode 16
episodes.description: The Fallen Heart Flame erupts from the tower, throwing the entire academy into chaos. Xiao Yan sees his chance to capture it.

episodes.title: Episode 17
episodes.description: Xiao Yan, along with the academy elders, battles the powerful Heavenly Flame. He is accidentally dragged underground with it.

episodes.title: Episode 18
episodes.description: Trapped deep beneath the earth, Xiao Yan begins a life-or-death struggle to refine the Fallen Heart Flame, enduring unimaginable pain.

episodes.title: Episode 19
episodes.description: Months pass. Everyone believes Xiao Yan is dead, but underground, he is slowly gaining control over the flame, his body and Dou Qi being reborn.

episodes.title: Episode 20
episodes.description: Xiao Yan finally emerges from the ground, having successfully absorbed the Fallen Heart Flame. His strength has skyrocketed to the Dou Wang level.

episodes.title: Episode 21
episodes.description: He returns to the Black-Corner Region to find his brothers' faction under attack. He arrives just in time to save them.

episodes.title: Episode 22
episodes.description: With his new power, Xiao Yan annihilates the enemy forces, establishing himself as a major power in the chaotic Black-Corner Region.

episodes.title: Episode 23
episodes.description: Xiao Yan decides it's time to return to the Jia Ma Empire to settle his score with the Misty Cloud Sect and rescue his father.

episodes.title: Episode 24
episodes.description: Returning to the empire, he finds the Misty Cloud Sect has allied with three other major sects to form an alliance, ruling with an iron fist.

episodes.title: Episode 25
episodes.description: Xiao Yan begins to gather his old allies, including Hai Bodong and the Primer clan, to form a counter-alliance to fight Yun Shan.

episodes.title: Episode 26
episodes.description: The 'Yan Alliance' is formed. Xiao Yan challenges the Misty Cloud Sect, leading to an all-out war for control of the Jia Ma Empire.

episodes.title: Episode 27
episodes.description: The forces of the Yan Alliance and the Misty Cloud Sect clash in a massive battle. Xiao Yan directly confronts the Dou Zong expert, Yun Shan.

episodes.title: Episode 28
episodes.description: Despite his growth, Xiao Yan struggles against Yun Shan. Queen Medusa joins the fray, evening the odds against the powerful Dou Zong.

episodes.title: Episode 29
episodes.description: Using a new, more powerful Angry Buddha Lotus Flame, Xiao Yan manages to severely injure Yun Shan.

episodes.title: Episode 30
episodes.description: As Yun Shan is about to be defeated, the Soul Hall envoy intervenes again, revealing their full control over the Misty Cloud Sect.

episodes.title: Episode 31
episodes.description: In a final, desperate act, Xiao Yan kills Yun Shan. The Misty Cloud Sect is defeated, but the Soul Hall remains a looming threat.

episodes.title: Episode 32
episodes.description: With the war over, Xiao Yan disbands the Misty Cloud Sect. Yun Yun, heartbroken, leaves the Jia Ma Empire.

episodes.title: Episode 33
episodes.description: Xiao Yan learns that to rescue Yao Lao and his father, he must travel to the Central Plains, a continent of true powerhouses.

episodes.title: Episode 34
episodes.description: He begins preparations for his journey, consolidating the Yan Alliance and searching for a way to cross the dangerous spatial void.

episodes.title: Episode 35
episodes.description: Xiao Yan says his goodbyes to his friends and family in the Jia Ma Empire, promising to return stronger.

episodes.title: Episode 36
episodes.description: His journey to the Central Plains begins. He encounters spatial storms and other dangers, testing his resolve.

episodes.title: Episode 37
episodes.description: Arriving in the Central Plains, Xiao Yan gets a humbling first look at the sheer power and scale of this new land.

episodes.title: Episode 38
episodes.description: He learns about the 'Pill Tower', the holy land for alchemists, and decides to head there to improve his skills and find information on the Soul Hall.

episodes.title: Episode 39
episodes.description: Xiao Yan gets into trouble with a local faction, the 'Wind Lightning Pavilion', and meets a mysterious girl named Feng Qing Er.

episodes.title: Episode 40
episodes.description: To escape, he uses a powerful movement technique, attracting the attention of the Wind Lightning Pavilion's experts.

episodes.title: Episode 41
episodes.description: He finds an ancient scroll containing the 'Three Thousand Lightning Movement', a legendary agility Dou Skill, and begins to master it.

episodes.title: Episode 42
episodes.description: Xiao Yan participates in an auction to acquire rare medicinal ingredients needed to refine a pill that can revive Yao Lao.

episodes.title: Episode 43
episodes.description: He clashes with other powerful alchemists and factions at the auction, using his wits and wealth to secure the items he needs.

episodes.title: Episode 44
episodes.description: The 'Pill Gathering', a grand alchemy competition held by the Pill Tower, is announced. Xiao Yan decides to participate to make a name for himself.

episodes.title: Episode 45
episodes.description: He begins the rigorous qualification tests for the Pill Gathering, facing off against the most talented young alchemists of the Central Plains.

episodes.title: Episode 46
episodes.description: Xiao Yan's exceptional alchemy skills once again draw the attention of many, including the giants of the Pill Tower and the ever-watchful Soul Hall.

episodes.title: Episode 47
episodes.description: The competition proper begins. The challenges are immense, testing not only refining skill but also soul control and endurance.

episodes.title: Episode 48
episodes.description: A rival from the Soul Hall attempts to sabotage Xiao Yan during a crucial refining process, but he manages to overcome the interference.

episodes.title: Episode 49
episodes.description: In the final round, Xiao Yan aims to refine a legendary tier-8 pill, a feat that would secure his place as a champion.

episodes.title: Episode 50
episodes.description: He successfully refines the pill, causing a 'Pill Lightning' phenomenon that attracts powerful experts from all over.

episodes.title: Episode 51
episodes.description: Xiao Yan wins the Pill Gathering championship, earning the right to enter the 'Star Region' and find the third type of Heavenly Flame.

episodes.title: Episode 52
episodes.description: As champion, he also gains the attention and protection of the Pill Tower, giving him the backing he needs to finally confront the Soul Hall.
